# Server Tools

## Running Commands

For mongodb operations that mongolite currently does not implement, you can still use the raw database command using the `run()` method:

```{r}
col <- mongo()
col$run('{"ping": 1}')
str(col$run('{"listCollections":1}'))
```

Some commands can only be run on the `admin` database:

```{r}
admin <- mongo(db = "admin")
str(admin$run('{"listDatabases":1}'))
```


## Server Info

Some server information is available in the `$info()` method:

```{r}
col$info()
```
